rows.label: qev085105_MSG0001
rows.name: I'm sorry if we frightened you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0001_2
rows.name: My name is Elma. And you are...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0003
rows.name: Are we correct in assuming that the Ganglion are after you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0004
rows.name: If so, we might be able to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0005
rows.name:
We come from a planet called Earth,
but now we're fighting the Ganglion here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0006
rows.name: Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0007
rows.name: Pay them no heed, Rock![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0008
rows.name: But Celica, they just beat up those bad guys![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0009
rows.name: It matters not. I shall not be fooled again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0010
rows.name: Well, either way, it's not safe here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev085105_SEL0011
rows.name: Express concern for the two of them.

rows.label: qev085105_JNK0020
rows.name: Interrogate

rows.label: qev085105_SEL0021
rows.name: Demand to know their background.

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0012
rows.name: Don't flatter us with your hollow kindness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0013
rows.name:
Listen, I understand that it may be hard for you
to trust a random pack of strangers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0014
rows.name:
But we really do want to help, if we can.
I hope you can believe us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0015
rows.name: Our...background?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0016
rows.name: We're just curious why the Ganglion are hunting you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0017
rows.name:
Easy now. There's no need to pry into their past
when we've just met, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0018
rows.name: Come on, Celica! They seem all right, don't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0019
rows.name: Perhaps, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0020
rows.name: Tatsu pleased to make acquaintance of new friend Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0021
rows.name: And you are...a Nopon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0022
rows.name: Indeed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0022_2_m
rows.name: Friends saved Tatsu from nasty Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0022_2_f
rows.name: Friends saved Tatsu from nasty Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0023
rows.name: Just like they saved us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0024
rows.name: Yes! So if Tatsu is trusting friends, Celica can too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0025
rows.name: Nopon's honor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0027
rows.name:
You might say that we're fugitives of a sort.
Ones that are running low on hiding places.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0028
rows.name: Our city, New LA, is home to many races besides humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0029
rows.name: Both of you would be welcome there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0030
rows.name:
There's no pressure, of course.
You can stay or leave as you see fit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0031
rows.name: Thank you. That is most kind. My name is Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0032
rows.name: And I'm Rock! Nice to meetcha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0033
rows.name: I'm Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0034
rows.name:
Here, these are the coordinates for New LA.
Can you get there okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0035
rows.name: I believe the two of us can manage, yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085105_MSG0036
rows.name: Then we'll see you back home. Take care, you two![ST:wait ]
